Summary: flying west, then stopped over trees, hovered for a minute or so and then turned (while hovering) and flew east. no sound or vibration was heard and there was no wind at all.
Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
divs: Sighting DetailsObserver was watching for meteors at night and at just a minute or so before midnight, saw object flying toward them (moving west) and then just hover above the trees on the street behind their house. observer thought at first maybe a predator type bird and realized it was much bigger and wider than a bird, more like a kite or triangle shape and non reflective as the street light underneath was not reflecting on the object. They then realized that there was neither wind nor sound and was having a hard time seeing it clearly like it was a shadow, no lights at all. and then the object turned while hovering and flew off eastward.
